actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution to maintain the decorum and dignity of the House, Members should be require to wear proper attire, as determined by the Speaker, in the Hall of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Requires Members of the House of Representatives to wear proper attire, as determined by the Speaker, while in the Hall of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A resolution to maintain the decorum and dignity of the House, Members should be require to wear proper attire, as determined by the Speaker, in the Hall of the House of Representatives.
